mapper.select: SELECT id, member_id, name, breed, age, weight, gender, description, image_url, medical_notes, created_at, updated_at FROM dogs WHERE member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dogs (member_id, name, breed, age, weight, gender, description, image_url, medical_notes, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{name}, #{breed}, #{age}, #{weight}, #{gender}, #{description}, #{imageUrl}, #{medicalNotes}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE dogs SET name = #{name}, breed = #{breed}, age = #{age}, weight = #{weight}, gender = #{gender}, description = #{description}, image_url = #{imageUrl}, medical_notes = #{medicalNotes}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
